verses.verse: Immediately <S%G2112><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> the morning <S%G4404><s%> the chief priests, <S%G749><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> the elders <S%G4245><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> scribes, <S%G1122><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the whole <S%G3650><s%> council, <S%G4892><s%> held <S%G4160><s%> a consultation, <S%G4824><s%> and bound <S%G1210><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> and carried <S%G667><s%> him away, <S%G667><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> delivered <S%G3860><s%> him up to Pilate. <S%G4091><s%>

Pilate <S%G4091><s%> asked <S%G1905><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> "Are <S%G1488><s%> you <S%G4771><s%> the King <S%G935><s%> of the Jews? <S%G2453><s%>" He <S%G1161><s%> answered, <S%G2036><s%> "So <S%G2036><s%> you <S%G4771><s%> say. <S%G2036><s%>"
The <S%G2532><s%> chief priests <S%G749><s%> accused <S%G2723><s%> him <S%G846><s%> of many things. <S%G4183><s%>

Pilate <S%G4091><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> asked <S%G1905><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> "Have <S%G3756><s%> you <S%G611><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> answer? <S%G1492><s%> See how many things <S%G4214><s%> they testify against <S%G2649><s%> you! <S%G4675><s%>"
But <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> made no <S%G3762><s%> further <S%G3765><s%> answer, <S%G611><s%> so that <S%G5620><s%> Pilate <S%G4091><s%> marveled. <S%G2296><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> at <S%G2596><s%> the feast <S%G1859><s%> he used to release <S%G630><s%> to them <S%G846><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> prisoner, <S%G1198><s%> whom <S%G3746><s%> they asked of him. <S%G154><s%>

There <S%G1161><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> one called <S%G3004><s%> Barabbas, <S%G912><s%> bound <S%G1210><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> those who <S%G3588><s%> had made insurrection, <S%G4955><s%> men who <S%G3748><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the insurrection <S%G4714><s%> had committed <S%G4160><s%> murder. <S%G5408><s%>

The <S%G2532><s%> multitude, <S%G3793><s%> crying aloud, <S%G310><s%> began <S%G756><s%> to ask <S%G2531><s%> him to do as <S%G2531><s%> he <S%G4160><s%> always <S%G104><s%> did <S%G4160><s%> for them. <S%G846><s%>

Pilate <S%G4091><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Do you <S%G2309><s%> want me to release <S%G630><s%> to you <S%G5213><s%> the King <S%G935><s%> of the Jews? <S%G2453><s%>"
For <S%G1063><s%> he perceived <S%G1097><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> envy <S%G5355><s%> the chief priests <S%G749><s%> had delivered <S%G3860><s%> him up. <S%G846><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> the chief priests <S%G749><s%> stirred <S%G383><s%> up the multitude, <S%G3793><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> he should <S%G630><s%> release <S%G630><s%> Barabbas <S%G912><s%> to them <S%G846><s%> instead. <S%G3123><s%>

Pilate <S%G4091><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> asked <S%G2036><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> "What <S%G5101><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> should I do <S%G4160><s%> to him whom <S%G3739><s%> you <S%G2309><s%> call <S%G3004><s%> the King <S%G935><s%> of the Jews? <S%G2453><s%>"
They <S%G1161><s%> cried out <S%G2896><s%> again, <S%G3825><s%> "Crucify <S%G4717><s%> him! <S%G846><s%>"

Pilate <S%G4091><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> "Why, <S%G5101><s%> what <S%G1063><s%> evil <S%G2556><s%> has he done? <S%G4160><s%>" But <S%G1161><s%> they cried out <S%G2896><s%> exceedingly, <S%G4056><s%> "Crucify <S%G4717><s%> him! <S%G846><s%>"

Pilate, <S%G4091><s%> wishing <S%G1014><s%> to <S%G4160><s%> please <S%G2425><s%> the multitude, <S%G3793><s%> released <S%G630><s%> Barabbas <S%G912><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> handed <S%G3860><s%> over Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> when he had flogged <S%G5417><s%> him, <S%G2443><s%> to be crucified. <S%G4717><s%>

The <S%G1161><s%> soldiers <S%G4757><s%> led <S%G520><s%> him <S%G846><s%> away <S%G520><s%> within <S%G2080><s%> the court, <S%G3739><s%> which <S%G2076><s%> is the Praetorium; <S%G4232><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they called together <S%G4779><s%> the whole <S%G3650><s%> cohort. <S%G4686><s%>

They <S%G2532><s%> clothed <S%G1746><s%> him <S%G846><s%> with purple, <S%G4209><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> weaving a crown <S%G4735><s%> of thorns, <S%G174><s%> they <S%G2532><s%> put it on <S%G4060><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>
They <S%G2532><s%> began <S%G756><s%> to salute <S%G782><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> "Hail, <S%G5463><s%> King <S%G935><s%> of the Jews! <S%G2453><s%>"

They <S%G2532><s%> struck <S%G5180><s%> his <S%G5180><s%> head <S%G2776><s%> with a reed, <S%G2563><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> spat <S%G1716><s%> on him, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> bowing <S%G5087><s%> their knees, <S%G1119><s%> did homage <S%G4352><s%> to him. <S%G846><s%>

When <S%G3753><s%> they had mocked <S%G1702><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> they took the purple <S%G4209><s%> off <S%G1562><s%> of <S%G1562><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> put <S%G1746><s%> his own <S%G2398><s%> garments <S%G2440><s%> on him. <S%G846><s%> They <S%G2532><s%> led <S%G1806><s%> him <S%G846><s%> out <S%G1806><s%> to <S%G2443><s%> crucify <S%G4717><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

They <S%G2532><s%> compelled <S%G29><s%> one <S%G5100><s%> passing by, <S%G3855><s%> coming from <S%G2064><s%> the <S%G575><s%> country, <S%G68><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> of Cyrene, <S%G2956><s%> the father <S%G3962><s%> of Alexander <S%G223><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Rufus, <S%G4504><s%> to <S%G2443><s%> go with them, <S%G142><s%> that he might bear his <S%G846><s%> cross. <S%G4716><s%>

They <S%G2532><s%> brought <S%G5342><s%> him <S%G846><s%> to <S%G1909><s%> the place <S%G5117><s%> called Golgotha, <S%G1115><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> is, <S%G2076><s%> being interpreted, <S%G3177><s%> "The place <S%G5117><s%> of a skull. <S%G2898><s%>"
They <S%G2532><s%> offered <S%G1325><s%> him <S%G846><s%> wine <S%G3631><s%> mixed with myrrh <S%G4669><s%> to drink, <S%G4095><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> he didn't <S%G3756><s%> take it. <S%G2983><s%>

Crucifying <S%G4717><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> they parted <S%G1266><s%> his <S%G846><s%> garments <S%G2440><s%> among them, <S%G846><s%> casting <S%G906><s%> lots <S%G2819><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> each <S%G5101><s%> should take. <S%G142><s%>
It <S%G1161><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> the third <S%G5154><s%> hour, <S%G5610><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> they crucified <S%G4717><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>
The <S%G2532><s%> superscription <S%G1923><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> accusation <S%G156><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> written over <S%G1924><s%> him, <S%G935><s%> "THE KING OF THE JEWS. <S%G2453><s%>"

With <S%G4862><s%> him <S%G846><s%> they crucified <S%G4717><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> robbers; <S%G3027><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> on <S%G1537><s%> his right hand, <S%G1188><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> one <S%G1537><s%> on <S%G1537><s%> his <S%G846><s%> left. <S%G2176><s%>

The <S%G2532><s%> Scripture <S%G1124><s%> was fulfilled, <S%G4137><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> says, <S%G3004><s%> "He <S%G2532><s%> was numbered <S%G3049><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> transgressors. <S%G459><s%>"

Those <S%G2532><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> passed by <S%G3899><s%> blasphemed <S%G987><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> wagging <S%G2795><s%> their <S%G846><s%> heads, <S%G2776><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Ha! <S%G3758><s%> You who <S%G3588><s%> destroy <S%G2647><s%> the temple, <S%G3485><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> build <S%G3618><s%> it in <S%G1722><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> days, <S%G2250><s%>
save <S%G4982><s%> yourself, <S%G4572><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> come down <S%G2597><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the cross! <S%G4716><s%>"

Likewise, <S%G3668><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> the chief priests <S%G749><s%> mocking <S%G1702><s%> among <S%G4314><s%> themselves <S%G240><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> the scribes <S%G1122><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> "He saved <S%G4982><s%> others. <S%G243><s%> He <S%G1410><s%> can't <S%G3756><s%> save <S%G4982><s%> himself. <S%G1438><s%>

Let the Christ, <S%G5547><s%> the King <S%G935><s%> of Israel, <S%G2474><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> come down <S%G575><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the cross, <S%G4716><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> we may see <S%G1492><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> believe <S%G4100><s%> him. <S%G2532><s%>" Those who <S%G3588><s%> were crucified <S%G4957><s%> with him <S%G846><s%> insulted <S%G3679><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

When <S%G1161><s%> the sixth <S%G1623><s%> hour <S%G5610><s%> had come, <S%G1096><s%> there was <S%G1096><s%> darkness <S%G4655><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> the whole <S%G3650><s%> land <S%G1093><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> the ninth <S%G1766><s%> hour. <S%G5610><s%>

At <S%G2532><s%> the ninth <S%G1766><s%> hour <S%G5610><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> cried <S%G994><s%> with a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice, <S%G5456><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Eloi, <S%G1682><s%> Eloi, <S%G1682><s%> lama <S%G2982><s%> sabachthani? <S%G4518><s%>" which <S%G3739><s%> is, <S%G2076><s%> being interpreted, <S%G3177><s%> "My <S%G3450><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> why <S%G5101><s%> have you forsaken <S%G1459><s%> me? <S%G1519><s%>"
Some <S%G5100><s%> of those who <S%G3588><s%> stood by, <S%G3936><s%> when they heard <S%G191><s%> it, <S%G3004><s%> said, "Behold, <S%G2400><s%> he is calling <S%G5455><s%> Elijah. <S%G2243><s%>"

One <S%G1520><s%> ran, <S%G5143><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> filling <S%G1072><s%> a sponge <S%G4699><s%> full <S%G1072><s%> of vinegar, <S%G3690><s%> put <S%G4060><s%> it on a reed, <S%G2563><s%> and <S%G5037><s%> gave <S%G4222><s%> it to him <S%G846><s%> to drink, <S%G4222><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Let him be. <S%G863><s%> Let <S%G1492><s%>'s see whether <S%G1487><s%> Elijah <S%G2243><s%> comes <S%G2064><s%> to take <S%G2507><s%> him <S%G846><s%> down. <S%G2507><s%>"
Jesus <S%G2424><s%> cried <S%G863><s%> out with a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice, <S%G5456><s%> and gave up the spirit. <S%G1606><s%>

The <S%G2532><s%> veil <S%G2665><s%> of the temple <S%G3485><s%> was torn <S%G4977><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the top <S%G509><s%> to <S%G2193><s%> the bottom. <S%G2736><s%>

When <S%G1161><s%> the centurion, <S%G2760><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> stood <S%G3936><s%> by <S%G1537><s%> opposite <S%G1727><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> he <S%G2896><s%> cried <S%G3779><s%> out <S%G2896><s%> like this and breathed his last, <S%G1606><s%> he said, <S%G2036><s%> "Truly <S%G230><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> man <S%G444><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God! <S%G2316><s%>"

There <S%G1161><s%> were <S%G2258><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> women <S%G1135><s%> watching <S%G2334><s%> from <S%G575><s%> afar, <S%G3113><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> were <S%G2258><s%> both <S%G2532><s%> Mary <S%G3137><s%> Magdalene, <S%G3094><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Mary <S%G3137><s%> the mother <S%G3384><s%> of James <S%G2385><s%> the less <S%G3398><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of Joses, <S%G2499><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Salome; <S%G4539><s%>

who, <S%G3739><s%> <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> he was <S%G2258><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> followed <S%G190><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> served <S%G1247><s%> him; <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> other women <S%G243><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> came up <S%G4872><s%> with him <S%G846><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem. <S%G2414><s%>

When <S%G2532><s%> evening <S%G3798><s%> had now <S%G2235><s%> come, <S%G1096><s%> because <S%G1893><s%> it was <S%G2258><s%> the Preparation <S%G3904><s%> Day, <S%G3739><s%> that is, <S%G2076><s%> the day before the Sabbath, <S%G4315><s%>

Joseph <S%G2501><s%> of <S%G575><s%> Arimathaea, <S%G707><s%> a prominent <S%G2158><s%> council member <S%G1010><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> himself <S%G846><s%> was looking <S%G4327><s%> for <S%G2258><s%> the Kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> came. <S%G2064><s%> He boldly <S%G5111><s%> went in <S%G1525><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> Pilate, <S%G4091><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> asked <S%G154><s%> for Jesus <S%G2424><s%>' body. <S%G4983><s%>

Pilate <S%G4091><s%> marveled <S%G2296><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> he were <S%G2348><s%> already <S%G2235><s%> dead; <S%G2348><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> summoning <S%G4341><s%> the centurion, <S%G2760><s%> he asked <S%G1905><s%> him <S%G846><s%> whether <S%G1487><s%> he had been <S%G599><s%> dead <S%G599><s%> long. <S%G3819><s%>
When <S%G2532><s%> he found <S%G1097><s%> out from <S%G575><s%> the centurion, <S%G2760><s%> he granted <S%G1433><s%> the body <S%G4983><s%> to Joseph. <S%G2501><s%>

He <S%G2532><s%> bought <S%G59><s%> a linen <S%G4616><s%> cloth, <S%G2532><s%> and taking <S%G2507><s%> him <S%G846><s%> down, <S%G2507><s%> wound him in <S%G1750><s%> the linen <S%G4616><s%> cloth, <S%G2532><s%> and laid <S%G2698><s%> him <S%G846><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> a tomb <S%G3419><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> had been <S%G2258><s%> cut <S%G2998><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> a rock. <S%G4073><s%> He <S%G2532><s%> rolled <S%G4351><s%> a stone <S%G3037><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> the door <S%G2374><s%> of the tomb. <S%G3419><s%>
Mary <S%G3137><s%> Magdalene <S%G3094><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> Mary, <S%G3137><s%> the mother of Joses, <S%G2499><s%> saw <S%G2334><s%> where <S%G4225><s%> he was laid. <S%G5087><s%>
